desc: SPRYNG™ is an innovative & affordable muscle recovery tool that uses active compression and is wireless and portable. SPRYNG improves circulation and relieves tired achy legs to make you feel great and perform at your best! Learn more.

layout.text: Smart, Active Compression is Now Available for Everyone
SPRYNG ™ is an affordable, untethered, pneumatic compression wrap muscle recovery tool that helps improve circulation, athletic performance, and so much more.
